summary:
- **Security Issuance**:  
  - **540,000 Ordinary Shares (IVX)** issued at AUD 0.11 per share.  
  - **540,000 Options (IVXO expiring 30-Jun-2027)** issued at AUD 0.015 per option.  

- **Purpose**: Settlement of 6% management and selling fees related to the Options Entitlement Offer underwritten by Blue Ocean Equities Pty Ltd.  

- **Post-Issuance Capital**:  
  - Ordinary Shares (IVX): **85,415,801**.  
  - Listed Options (IVXO): **19,765,155**.  

- **No Security Holder Approval**: Issued under 15% placement capacity (Listing Rule 7.1); total of **1,080,000 securities** issued without approval.  

- **Prospectus Reference**: [Options Entitlement Offer Prospectus](https://investors.inviongroup.com/announcements/7017075).  

*Note: No material valuation or liquidity impacts beyond standard fee settlement dilution.*
